protein.specific_function: Serine/threonine protein kinase involved in regulating M phase functions during the cell cycle. May also be part of the signaling network controlling cellular adhesion. In vitro, is able to phosphorylate CDC25C and casein

go_class.description: receptor signaling protein serine/threonine kinase activity
